original_text: As for us, our eyes as yet failed for our vain help: in our watching we have watched for a nation that could not save us.
korean_text: 우리가 헛되이 도움을 바라므로 우리의 눈이 상함이여 우리를 구원하지 못할 나라를 바라보고 바라보았도다

sentences.original_text: As for us, our eyes as yet failed
in our watching we have watched
for a nation that could not save us.
